Instance.description: A class defining a type of object slot.

Tunable.name: bb_only
Tunable.description: If checked, this slot is only intended to be use to make placement easier and shouldn't have any gameplay repercussions. Example: A sim trying to use a chair slotted to a campfire wil not have the sim pull the chair out when trying to sit near the campfire.

TunableVariant.name: bone_name_hash
TunableVariant.description: The name of the bone this slot is associated to.

Tunable.name: referenced_by_animation
Tunable.description: The name of the bone this slot is associated to.

Tunable.name: is_surface
Tunable.description: This should be checked if objects can be placed in this slot by Sims or if having this slot would imply the object is considered a surface, such as slots for chairs.
